meaning_str.bing:
adv. 一次；曾经；仅一次；根本
conj. 一旦；一…就；当…时候
n. 一次
adj. 从前的
网络. 一度；一奏倾情；有一次

一次；曾经；一度；一旦；一回

1.en: "You once let me play in your garden, " said the child. "Today you'll come with me into my garden in heaven. "
1.cn: “你曾经让我在你的花园里游玩，”男骇说，“今天我就要把你带到我天国里的花园里去。”

2.en: France, long a symbol of colonialist oppression in North Africa, looked once again like the hated imperial power it had formerly been.
2.cn: 长久以来，法国在北非被视为殖民压迫的象征，此番再次被视为过去那个令人憎恨的皇权。

3.en: but it seems to be already well-established that dreams have once and for all left the world of unreality for the world of the laboratory.
3.cn: 但是有一点已经得到了很好地证明——梦已经彻底离开了非现实世界，进入了实验室。

0.en: The thing about surgery is, once you're in, you're in.
0.cn: 手术一旦开始，就不能停下。

1.en: But once you open the box, you've voided the warranty.
1.cn: 但是一旦开箱，保修单就作废了。

2.en: Once all these pieces are in position... Triple Yahtzee?
2.cn: 一旦所有的宝石都集齐了…然后就同花顺吗？

3.en: Once you've got these on here, don't move them for at least 10 minutes.
3.cn: 一旦你到了这一步，放置10分钟不要移动。

4.en: Once you'd agreed she would have got pregnant, don't you worry.
4.cn: 你一旦答应， 她就会想办法怀上，这你不用担心。

5.en: Once risen, the trencher bakes for about half an hour at 220 degrees.
5.cn: 一旦发酵完毕，放到220度的烤箱里半个小时。

6.en: Revenge is not good once you're done. Believe. It's better to forget.
6.cn: 一旦开始复仇，就不会有好结果的，相信我，还是忘了好。

7.en: I don't know, she'll never go for the kid once she gets a peek at this.
7.cn: 不好说，一旦让她瞄到我的话，她肯定不会去找那小孩了。

8.en: Once you've opened your heart, you can't close it again. I'm kidding! Of course you can.
8.cn: 一旦敞开心扉，就再也无法关上了。我是在开玩笑。

9.en: Once they get to the Euphrates, they'll have a choke hold on northern Syria.
9.cn: 一旦他们进入幼发拉底河流域，他们将扼住北叙利亚的命门。

10.en: Once the investigation is complete, we'll be able to share the actual computer simulations.
10.cn: 调查一旦完成，我们将公开具体的计算机模拟结果。

11.en: Oh, come on. Chandler's funny, sophisticated, and he's very lovable, once you get to know him.
11.cn: 钱德风趣、成熟，一旦了解他，就会觉得他很可爱。

12.en: And once I get there, well, I'm gonna save all these pages for all the adventures I'm gonna have.
12.cn: 一旦我到了那里，我就把将来的探险日志写在后面。

13.en: Once an idea has taken hold of the brain, it's almost impossible to eradicate. An idea that is fully formed, fully understood, that sticks. Right in there somewhere.
13.cn: 一旦扎根 根深蒂固盘亘脑海。

14.en: Mmm. I don't know. It's pretty, but there's really nothing to do once it gets dark.
14.cn: 我不知道，这很美，但这里一旦天黑真的就没什么可以做了。

15.en: Once the wolves have finished with him, Belle will have no one to take care of her, but me.
15.cn: 一旦狼群把他吃了，贝儿就会无依无靠，只能跟着我了。

16.en: But once you wake up, whatever you've done will take hold and become history.
16.cn: 但是，只要你一旦醒来，你所做的任何事都会固定下来，变成历史。

17.en: Why? Once you're fluent, You'll have a billion more people to annoy instead of me.
17.cn: 为什么？一旦你学得溜了，你就又多了十几亿的人去烦，我就解放了。

18.en: I love you. You better. Get your fix now, because once we get into the office...
18.cn: 我爱你，最好是这样哦，现在腻歪个够吧，因为一旦我们去办公室...

19.en: And once the moon is mine, the world will give me whatever I want to get it back!
19.cn: 一旦月球落到我手里，想要我交出来的话 整个世界都得满足我的任何条件！
